<samp>'''gui.png'''</samp> and <samp>'''gui2.png'''</samp> are [[texture atlas]]es for storing textures of widgets {{in|BE}}.

'''<samp>widgets.png</samp>''' (previously known as ''<samp>gui.png</samp>'') was a [[texture atlas]] for storing textures of widgets {{in|JE}}.

== Format ==
<samp>gui.png</samp> is a fixed-width 256×256-pixel file containing textures of most widgets, including [[hotbar]] and selection,  and unused red, green, and gray circles, crosshair (used one in [[icons.png]]), and old notification symbols for [[Realms]].

<samp>gui2.png</samp> is an unused{{Check the code}} fixed-width 256×256-pixel file containing old textures of some widgets.

<samp>widgets.png</samp> was a fixed-width 256×256-pixel file containing textures of all widgets, including [[hotbar]] and selection, [[dual wield]] slots, menu buttons, and unused red, green and gray circles, crosshair (used one in [[icons.png]]), and old notification symbols for [[Realms]].
== History ==
{{info needed section|The latest bedrock gui.png still has old effect textures, implying gui.png is no longer (or possibly was never) used for effect textures - where are they now and when did they move there?}}
The file was compressed in 13w09a, 15w49a and 1.11-pre1.
